pullrequest.title: Added tutorial for contributing a model

content.raw: Looks like a good short tutorial, but we already have a similar tutorials at http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=build_model&cat=build_robot http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=build_robot&cat=build_robot. Perhaps we should give those tutorials more general titles ("building a model" instead of "building a robot").
content.html: Looks like a good short tutorial, but we already have a similar tutorials at http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=build_model&cat=build_robot http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=build_robot&cat=build_robot. Perhaps we should give those tutorials more general titles ("building a model" instead of "building a robot").
